@graph.label: Event
@graph.skos:definition: An event happening at a certain time and location, such as a concert, lecture, or festival.

@graph.description: Buy and sell tickets online for concerts, sports, theater, family and other events near you from Ticketmaster.
@graph.label: Ticketmaster

@graph.description: Buy and sell sports tickets, concert tickets, theater tickets and Broadway tickets on StubHub!
@graph.label: Stubhub

@graph.description: SeatGeek is the Web's largest event ticket search engine. Discover events you love, search all ticket sites, see seat locations and get the best deals on tickets.
@graph.label: Seatgeek

info.description: The Ticketmaster Discovery API allows you to search for events, attractions, or venues.
info.title: Discovery API

get.description: Find attractions (artists, sports, packages, plays and so on) and filter your search by name, and much more.

parameters.description: Sorting order of the search result. Allowable Values : 'name,asc', 'name,desc', 'relevance,asc', 'relevance,desc'
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filter attractions by classification name: name of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type
parameters.name: classificationName

parameters.description: Filter attractions by classification id: id of any segment, genre, sub-genre, type, sub-type
parameters.name: classificationId

parameters.description: Keyword to search on
parameters.name: keyword

parameters.description: Filter entities by its id
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Filter entities by its source name
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: True if you want to have entities flag as test in the response. Only, if you only wanted test entities
parameters.name: includeTest

parameters.description: Page number
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Page size of the response
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: The locale in ISO code format. Multiple comma-separated values can be provided. When omitting the country part of the code (e.g. only 'en' or 'fr') then the first matching locale is used. When using a '*' it matches all locales. '*' can only be used at the end (e.g. 'en-us,en,*')
parameters.name: locale

parameters.description: Yes if you want to display licensed content
parameters.name: includeLicensedContent

parameters.description: yes, to include spell check suggestions in the response.
parameters.name: includeSpellcheck

endApproximate.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the access end date is approximated

startApproximate.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the access start date is approximated

Accessibility.description: Additional information for people who experience disabilities

id.description: Unique id of the entity in the discovery API

locale.description: Locale in which the content is returned

test.description: Indicate if this is a test entity, by default test entities won't appear in discovery API

url.description: URL of a web site detail page of the entity

primary.description: True if this is the entity's primary classification

softLanding.description: True the landing is Soft otherwise it's Comingled

approximate.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the end date is approximated

localDate.description: The event end date in local date

noSpecificTime.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the event end time has no specific time

id.description: Unique id of the entity in the discovery API

info.description: Any information related to the event

locale.description: Locale in which the content is returned

pleaseNote.description: Any notes related to the event

test.description: Indicate if this is a test entity, by default test entities won't appear in discovery API

url.description: URL of a web site detail page of the entity

spanMultipleDays.description: Flag indicating if date spans of multiple days

EventImages.description: This class defines an Event with only images view on the Discovery API

id.description: Unique id of the entity in the discovery API
An external link id is the unique identifier of a resource on a different domain or api

url.description: An external link url is a url that goes to a different domain or api

id.description: The ID of the classification's level

name.description: The Name of the classification's level

fallback.description: true if the image is not the event's image but a fallbak image

id.description: The ID of the classification's level

name.description: The Name of the classification's level

url.description: Url to the web page of the parking

postalCode.description: Postal code / zipcode of the place

endDateTime.description: Presale's end dates. The date and time when the presale will end

startDateTime.description: Presale's start dates. The date and time when the presale will start

endDateTime.description: Public sale's end dates. The date and time when the public sale will end

startDateTime.description: Public sale's start dates. The date and time when the public sale will start

startTBD.description: True if the public sale's date is to be determined

PublicVisibility.description: The class defines the public visibility period on the Discovery/Publish API.

id.description: The ID of the related entity

references.description: References of this relationship in another system. Reference is the exact same entity

source.description: The source name of the related entity

id.description: The ID of the classification's level

name.description: The Name of the classification's level

dateTBA.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the start date is TBA

dateTBD.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the start date is TBD

localDate.description: The event start date in local date

noSpecificTime.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the event start time has no specific time

timeTBA.description: Boolean flag to indicate whether or not the start time is TBA

currency.description: Default currency of ticket prices for events in this venue

dma.description: The list of associated DMAs (Designated Market Areas) of the venue

postalCode.description: Postal code / zipcode of the venue

url.description: URL of a web site detail page of the entity

acceptedPaymentDetail.description: Venue box office accepted payment details

willCallDetail.description: Venue box office will call details

apiKey.description: This API uses an apikey to authenticate users. [More info](https://developer.ticketmaster.com/products-and-docs/apis/discovery-api/v2/#overview)
apiKey.name: apikey

get.description: Lists all events on the StubHub platform. Use this endpoint to sync the entire StubHub event catalog with your application.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page of data to retrieve.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Set custom page sizes on response.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Filters the response to only return items that have been updated since the given timestamp

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Determines the ordering of items. A comma-separated string containing `resource_version`.

schema.description: Filters results to only include events located in the specified country.

put.description: List a specified set of events on the StubHub platform.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page of data to retrieve.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Set custom page sizes on response.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Filters the response to only return items that have been updated since the given timestamp

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Determines the ordering of items. A comma-separated string containing `resource_version`.

schema.description: Filters results to only include events located in the specified country.

parameters.name: externalEventId
parameters.description: The event identifier from the external platform.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The event identifier

get.description: Search for events on the StubHub platform. Use this endpoint to search the entire StubHub event catalog with your application.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The query text to be used to match events.

parameters.name: dateLocal
parameters.description: The specific date of the event, this is optional

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page of data to retrieve.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Set custom page sizes on response.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Filters the response to only return items that have been updated since the given timestamp

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Determines the ordering of items. A comma-separated string containing `resource_version`.

schema.description: Filters results to only include events located in the specified country.

get.description: Lists all venues on the StubHub platform. Use this endpoint to sync the entire StubHub Venue catalog with your application.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page of data to retrieve.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Set custom page sizes on response.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Filters the response to only return items that have been updated since the given timestamp

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Determines the ordering of items. A comma-separated string containing `resource_version`.

schema.description: Filters results to only include venues located in the specified country.

parameters.name: venueId
parameters.description: The venue identifier

Event.description: An event on the StubHub platform.

start_date.description: The date when the event starts.

end_date.description: The date when the event ends.

on_sale_date.description: The date when tickets for the event will go onsale.

date_confirmed.description: True if the event start and end date have been confirmed; Otherwise, false.

time_confirmed.description: True if the event start and end time have been confirmed; Otherwise, false.

type.description: The type of the event. Can be `Main` or `Parking`

min_ticket_price.description: The minimum ticket price of the event.

status.description: The status of the event. Can be `Normal`, `Postponed`, `Cancelled`, `Rescheduled`, `Relocated`, `RelocatedAndRescheduled`, `Draft`, `Contingent` and `Deleted`

Money.description: Returned for monetary values, such as ticket prices, fees charged and tax amounts.

amount.description: The decimal amount of the money.

currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code that the monetary value is represented in.

display.description: A user-friendly string representing the monetary value.

event:webpage.description: Url on the website for the event

external_mappings.description: The external mappings for this event

venue.description: The venue where the event is taking place.

EventCategory.description: A Category represents a grouping of events or other categories. Examples are Concerts, Rock and Pop and Lady Gaga.

role.description: The role of the category for a particular event. Can be `MainArtist`, `SupportingArtist`, `HomeTeam`, `AwayTeam`, `Tournament`, `HeadlineAct`, `StandardAct`, `Festival`, `SportsLeague`, `ConcertTour`.

external_mappings.description: The external mappings for this category

EmbeddedExternalMapping.description: An external mapping between a resource on the StubHub platform and the same resource on another platforms.

id.description: The identifier of the resource in the external platform

platform_name.description: The name of the external platform. Can be `legacy_stubhub`.

EmbeddedCategory.description: A Category represents a grouping of events or other categories. Examples are Concerts, Rock and Pop and Lady Gaga.

external_mappings.description: The external mappings for this category

EmbeddedVenue.description: A venue is a location where an event takes place.

city.description: The name of the city where the venue is located.

state_province.description: The name of the State or Province where the venue is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code for the venue.

country.description: The Country where the venue is located.

external_mappings.description: The external mappings for this venue

code.description: The two-letter ISO 3166 code for the country.

event_ids.description: The StubHub event identifiers of the events to be retrieved.

Venue.description: An venue on the StubHub platform.

city.description: The name of the city where the venue is located.

state_province.description: The name of the State or Province where the venue is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code for the venue.

country.description: The Country where the venue is located.

external_mappings.description: The external mappings for this venue

requires_authentication.description: Authentication credentials were missing or incorrect.

not_found.description: The URI requested is invalid or the resource requested, such as an event, does not exist.

forbidden.description: The request is understood, but it has been refused or access is not allowed. An accompanying error message will explain why.

validation_failed.description: The request data is not valid. errors will contain an object with a localized message that describes the validation error for each property of the data.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: A comma-separated list of the name(s) of the field(s) to be returned.

embed.name: embed
embed.description: Optional embedded resources are only included in a resource when your application includes the embedded property name(s) as a comma-separated value in the embed parameter.

VGG-Topic.description: Name of the topic that triggered this delivery
